mapper.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.qyid qyid,a.qybm qybm,a.qymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jydz dizhi,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc from t_qyjbxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0 and a.hylbdm = #{hylbdm}
order by a.qyid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_qyjbxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0 and a.hylbdm = #{hylbdm}

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.qiyeid qyid,a.qiyebianma qybm,a.qiyemc qymc, a.farenmc frxm,a.lianxidh lxdh,a.xiangxidizhi dizhi,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc from t_lvguan a where a.zhuxiaobz = 0
order by a.qiyeid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_lvguan a where a.zhuxiaobz = 0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.ddqyid qyid,a.ddqybm qybm,a.ddqymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jydz dizhi,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc from t_ddqyxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0
order by a.ddqyid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_ddqyxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.jxqyid qyid,a.jxqybm qybm,a.jxqymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jydz dizhi,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc from t_jxqyxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0
order by a.jxqyid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_jxqyxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.zzdwid qyid,a.zzdwbm qybm,a.zzdwmc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jydz dizhi,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc from t_yzzzdwxx a where a.zxbz = 0
order by a.zzdwid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_yzzzdwxx a where a.zxbz = 0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.WYBZ qyid,a.CAIJIDIANBM qybm,a.CAIJIDIANMC qymc, a.FUZEREN frxm,a.LIANXIDH lxdh,a.XIANGXIDIZHI dizhi,a.GXDWMC gxdwmc from t_caijidian a where a.ISZHUXIAO = 0
order by a.WYBZ desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_caijidian a where a.ISZHUXIAO = 0
mapper.update:
update t_lvguan a set a.zhuxiaobz = 0
where 1=1 and a.zhuxiaobz = 0
mapper.select:
select a.qiyeid qyid,a.hangyelx qylx,a.qiyebianma qybm,a.qiyemc qymc, a.qitaisblx qycplxbm,a.farenmc frxm,a.zongjingli zjl, a.zhianzrr zafzr,a.xiangxidizhi dizhi,a.lianxidh lxdh, a.baoanbudh babdh,a.zhuangtai qyzt,a.zhuangtaigbrq qyztgbrq, a.jiqijiamibh jqbm,a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.qiyexingzhi_dm qyxz,a.congyerenshu cyrs,a.zhibaorenshu zbrys, a.jingpeixunrs jpxrs,a.dengjiriqi fwksrq,a.fangjianshu fjs, a.chuangweishu cws,a.qiyexingji bgxj,a.qiyedengji bgdj,a.yewulbbm zflbm from t_lvguan a where a.zhuxiaobz = 0
order by a.qiyeid desc

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.qiyeid qyid,a.hangyelx qylx,a.qiyebianma qybm,a.qiyemc qymc, a.qitaisblx qycplxbm,a.farenmc frxm,a.zongjingli zjl, a.zhianzrr zafzr,a.xiangxidizhi dizhi,a.lianxidh lxdh, a.baoanbudh babdh,a.zhuangtai qyzt,a.zhuangtaigbrq qyztgbrq, a.jiqijiamibh jqbm,a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.qiyexingzhi_dm qyxz,a.congyerenshu cyrs,a.zhibaorenshu zbrys, a.jingpeixunrs jpxrs,a.dengjiriqi fwksrq,a.fangjianshu fjs, a.chuangweishu cws,a.qiyexingji bgxj,a.qiyedengji bgdj,a.yewulbbm zflbm from t_lvguan a where a.zhuxiaobz = 0
order by a.qiyeid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_lvguan a where a.zhuxiaobz = 0

select a.qyid qyid,a.qybm qybm ,a.qymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.bafzrxm zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,a.bafzrdh babdh, a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.zrs cyrs,a.bars zbrys, a.jgpxrs jpxrs,a.lrsj fwksrq, a.bxbjsl bxsl,a.cksl cksl,a.qyzflbm zflbm from t_qyjbxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0 and a.hylbdm = #{hylbdm}
order by a.qyid desc

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.qyid qyid,a.qybm qybm ,a.qymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.bafzrxm zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,a.bafzrdh babdh, a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.zrs cyrs,a.bars zbrys, a.jgpxrs jpxrs,a.lrsj fwksrq, a.bxbjsl bxsl,a.cksl cksl,a.qyzflbm zflbm from t_qyjbxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0 and a.hylbdm = #{hylbdm}
order by a.qyid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_qyjbxx a where a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0 and a.hylbdm = #{hylbdm}

select a.ddqyid qyid,a.ddqybm qybm ,a.ddqymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,b.bafzrxm zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,b.bafzrdh babdh, a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, b.zrs cyrs,b.bars zbrys, b.jgpxrs jpxrs,a.lrsj fwksrq from t_ddqyxx a , t_ddcdryxx b where a.ddqyid = b.ddqyid and a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0
order by a.ddqyid desc

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.ddqyid qyid,a.ddqybm qybm ,a.ddqymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,b.bafzrxm zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,b.bafzrdh babdh, a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, b.zrs cyrs,b.bars zbrys, b.jgpxrs jpxrs,a.lrsj fwksrq from t_ddqyxx a , t_ddcdryxx b where a.ddqyid = b.ddqyid and a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0
order by a.ddqyid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_ddqyxx a , t_ddcdryxx b where a.ddqyid = b.ddqyid and a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0

select a.jxqyid qyid,a.jxqybm qybm ,a.jxqymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,b.bafzrxm zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,b.bafzrdh babdh, a.gxdwdm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, b.zrs cyrs,b.bars zbrys, b.jgpxrs jpxrs,a.lrsj fwksrq,a.qyflbm zflbm from t_jxqyxx a , t_jxcdryxx b where a.jxqyid = b.jxqyid and a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0
order by a.jxqyid desc

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.jxqyid qyid,a.jxqybm qybm ,a.jxqymc qymc, a.frdb frxm,b.bafzrxm zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,b.bafzrdh babdh, a.gxdwdm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, b.zrs cyrs,b.bars zbrys, b.jgpxrs jpxrs,a.lrsj fwksrq,a.qyflbm zflbm from t_jxqyxx a , t_jxcdryxx b where a.jxqyid = b.jxqyid and a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0
order by a.jxqyid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_jxqyxx a , t_jxcdryxx b where a.jxqyid = b.jxqyid and a.zxbz = 0 and a.scbz = 0

select a.zzdwid qyid,a.zzdwbm qybm ,a.zzdwmc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.zafzr zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,a.bwbmdh babdh, a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc,a.lrsj fwksrq from t_yzzzdwxx a where a.zxbz = 0
order by a.zzdwid desc

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.zzdwid qyid,a.zzdwbm qybm ,a.zzdwmc qymc, a.frdb frxm,a.zafzr zafzr,a.jydz dizhi, a.lxdh lxdh,a.bwbmdh babdh, a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc,a.lrsj fwksrq from t_yzzzdwxx a where a.zxbz = 0
order by a.zzdwid desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_yzzzdwxx a where a.zxbz = 0

select a.WYBZ qyid,a.CAIJIDIANBM qybm ,a.CAIJIDIANMC qymc, a.FUZEREN frxm,a.GUANXIAMINJING zafzr,a.XIANGXIDIZHI dizhi, a.LIANXIDH lxdh, a.GXDWBM gxdwbm,a.GXDWMC gxdwmc,a.DENGJIRQ fwksrq from t_caijidian a where a.ISZHUXIAO = 0
order by a.WYBZ desc

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.WYBZ qyid,a.CAIJIDIANBM qybm ,a.CAIJIDIANMC qymc, a.FUZEREN frxm,a.GUANXIAMINJING zafzr,a.XIANGXIDIZHI dizhi, a.LIANXIDH lxdh, a.GXDWBM gxdwbm,a.GXDWMC gxdwmc,a.DENGJIRQ fwksrq from t_caijidian a where a.ISZHUXIAO = 0
order by a.WYBZ desc ) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_caijidian a where a.ISZHUXIAO = 0
mapper.delete: delete from license a where stationid = #{stationid}
